head-content.title: Home Page
head-content.description: The Devbridge Sourcery Academy was created to allow students improve their skills and prepare for a career in the IT industry. Additionally, each student is awarded a trial with the company, giving them a chance to gain real work experience.

intro-section.title: Sourcery Academy
intro-section.content: Sourcery academy is our free of charge education program created to allow students to improve their skills and prepare for a career in the IT industry.There are three academies available. They serve as our long - term commitment to increase the number of students in Lithuania entering information technologies studies.

academies-section.title: Academies
academies-section.content: There are four disciplines available: for developers, testers, front-end developers and kids. Academies are taking place in Devbridge Lithuanian offices. Students, who are willing to join developers, testers or Front-End academies, need to pass the test, prove their best to get an invitation to enroll. This rule doesn’t apply to the kids (7 to 12 years old) academy, the admission is limited only by available number of entries.

developers.title: Sourcery for Developers
developers.content: A free of charge three-month cutting-edge technology course, available in the Spring and Fall of each year.Students are invited to the Devbridge in Kaunas and Vilnius offices to attend lectures and create custom projects with the help of software development professionals.

btn.aria-label: Go to Sourcery for Developers page

img.alt: A person working on a laptop

testers.title: Sourcery for Testers
testers.content: Top-notch studies for the future Test Engineers. Students join the Devbridge team as a paid employee for the Academy period (two months) to learn and work. Ones who finish the Academy successfully are invited to continue employment on full time.

btn.aria-label: Go to Sourcery for Testers page

front-end.title: Sourcery for Front-End
front-end.content: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End Developers. Complete the admission and enter our free of charge two-month academy this autumn in Vilnius to learn from our top specialists.

btn.aria-label: Go to Sourcery for Front-End page

img.alt: Logos of HTML, CSS and Javascript

kids.title: Sourcery for Kids
kids.content: Sourcery for Kids seeks to educate kids giving them opportunity to learn and apply technological product development skills. For the entire academic year, the children will study key aspects of programming, from logical concepts and functions, through to variables, sequences, coordinates, and movement.

btn.aria-label: Go to Sourcery for Kids page

content-boxes.content: Sourcery seeks to inspire and educate the students giving them the opportunity to learn and apply technological product development skills.
content-boxes.author: Laura Hales
content-boxes.title: Sourcery for Testers Graduate

content-boxes.content: During the 3 month academy we managed to learn not only the basics, but also to create advanced web pages. I am glad that I chose to apply and challenge myself. I would definitely recommend to apply for anyone who’s interested in front-end.
content-boxes.author: Lucas Celab
content-boxes.title: Sourcery for Front-End Graduate

content-boxes.content: I really enjoyed working with the team using agile principles.
content-boxes.author: Thomas Shelby
content-boxes.title: Sourcery for Developers Graduate

img.alt: Students are taking the admission test
The first day of sourcery academy
Student is taking a virtual tour of DevBridge offices

head-content.title: Register
head-content.description: Select Academy. There are three disciplines available: for Developers, Testers and Front-End. Academies are taking place in Devbridge Lithuanian offices. Students, who are willing to join developers, testers or Front-End academies, need to pass the test, prove their best to get an invitation to enroll.

head-content.title: Sourcery for Testers
head-content.description: Set your inner tester free with Sourcery for Testers! Kick off your career in software testing with our free of charge two-month academy “Sourcery for Testers”, available this summer. Work with our top specialists as your mentors and lecturers in Kaunas and Vilnius.

apply-section.content: Set your inner tester free and apply to empower yourself with the top-notch studies for the future Test Engineers!

img.alt: Woman in midair cheering with a mobile phone showing checkmark sign in the background

cards.heading: Testing Foundations. Manual Testing. Exploratory Testing

steps-section.title: Apply
steps-section.content: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the testing beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

steps-section.title: Pass the admission
steps-section.content: Best candidates will be offered a paid internship for the Academy period to work on the real projects with our development teams. In parallel they are expected to attend academy to develop their skills.

steps-section.title: Learn from the experts
steps-section.content: Students will discover all types of techniques: learn the foundations of testing, functional testing for web applications and API, foundations of non-functional testing and foundations for test automation.

steps-section.title: Join the company
steps-section.content: At the end of term all students will receive a certificate of completion the Sourcery academy for Testers. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Test Engineer.

head-content.title: Sourcery for Developers
head-content.description: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Developers. Complete the admission and enter our free of charge three-month academy, available in the Spring and Fall of each year. Students are invited to the Devbridge Group in Kaunas and Vilnius offices to attend lectures and create custom projects with the help of software development professionals.

apply-section.content: Entrance test results define a priority list of candidates. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.

img.alt: People high fiving each other in midair

steps-section.title: Apply
steps-section.content: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional three-month course for the developer beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or group assignments.

steps-section.title: Pass the admission
steps-section.content: Registration is available for candidates who are willing to pass the entry exam. Results define a list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into the academy.

steps-section.title: Learn from the experts
steps-section.content: Students will learn the latest technologies and how to create software using the best tools on the market. Devbridge assigns a mentor to each student to serve as a resource for their development projects.

steps-section.title: Join the company
steps-section.content: At the end of term all students will receive recognition for completing the course and top students may receive job offers from Devbridge.

head-content.title: Sourcery for Front-End
head-content.description: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End Developers. Complete the admission and enter our free of charge two-month academy this autumn to learn from our top specialists.

apply-section.content: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End Developers.

img.alt: People cheering with a mantle hat between them

cards.heading: Tips & tricks to build clean and functional CSS

steps-section.title: Apply
steps-section.content: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the front-end developers, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

steps-section.title: Pass the admission
steps-section.content: Entry test is performed by those candidates who submit their summary. Test results define a priority list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.

steps-section.title: Learn from the experts
steps-section.content: Students will discover all types, techniques and design approaches. They will learn how to write semantic elements in HTML, apply advanced CSS techniques, understand accessibility standards and many more.

steps-section.title: Join the company
steps-section.content: The Academy starts in the end of October and lasts until January. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Front-End Software Engineer.

frontend.title: Push the Pixels with Sourcery Academy for Front-End
frontend.content: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End. Complete the admission and enter our free of charge three-month academy to learn from our top specialists.

developers.title: Sourcery Academy for Developers
developers.content: Become a software development with our free of charge three-month academy, available this fall and spring. Work with our top specialists as your mentors and lecturers in Kaunas and Vilnius.

testers.title: Set your inner tester free with Sourcery for Testers!
testers.content: Kick off your career in software testing with our free of charge three-month academy “Sourcery for Testers”, available this summer. Work with our top specialists as your mentors and lecturers in Kaunas and Vilnius.
